div.head: Description of changes for 2012.07
div.p: This is the first public version of this text. It a draft copied from the St. Victor transcription. Many of its section headers still await correction. Other corrections and additions to the text will be made pending a collation comparision of available manuscript witnesses. Citations, cross-references, and a critical apparatus still await construction.
